c: p:my little pony friendship is magic
d:
An incomplete MLP Hentai Comic with gifs by Cloppy Hooves/PoneTan found on ponybooru. From what I could tell, the artist is still working on it so we'll see some more pages in the future.

Some of the files where too big to upload so I had to improvise and compressed some of them, sadly. Hopefully I did a good job.
